![](images/penguins.jpg)

Welcome! This course introduces students in the life sciences to data science through the application of quantitative reasoning and the R programming language to "real-world" problems. Students will follow a narrative set at an Antarctic colony and each module introduces them to basic programming, data visualization, statistics, machine learning, and interpretation of quantitative concepts.
